notes: Montei a Lore com bastante carinho e esforço, tó muito animado pra esse Rpg e espero que gostem quando lerem isso e gostem de mim como um companheiro e como futuro Lancer
history:
O COMEÇO: ORIGEM,NASCIMENTO E QUEDA


O Mundo onde cresci, um mundo belo lindo e vasto, apelidado de "a grande Safira" habitando

na constelação "Dourada" a Grande safira...ou melhor o exoplaneta "TOI-700 D" se encontra

Orbitando uma Ana Vermelha, Descoberto em 3 de Janeiro de 2020 e finalmente levando humanos

no ano 7080 após o grande colapso do planeta chamado "Terra" seria ali onde eu cresceria

com minha mãe e Pai "August" e "Helise" que foram morar na parte media do planeta, nem a muito rica

e nem a muito pobre...lá era mediano as vezes tinham caras cheios da Grana, as vezes não

as vezes vinham gente pedir reparos pra mim e meu pai, e alguns pedindo remedios a minha mãe

Era Trampo atrás de trampo reparando a rede elétrica, chuveiros, carros e o meu favorito, mechas clandestinos de combate... meu velho avó "Eden" sendo um pequeno líder de engenheiros vivia

contando das historias do meu pai dizendo que ele era um Lancer e que pilotava como ninguém

que era alguém que colocava medo nos narcotraficantes e contrabandistas e Lancers folgados, tenho certa dó do meu avó

ele já ta meio ruim da cabeça, nunca consegui pensar, visualizar o que seja, meu pai...um Lancer

Nah ele e mais gentil que uma joaninha, mas o velho sempre insistia nisso principalmente quando reparávamos os mechas ilegais

nas arenas de aço e fogo, era só o velho ver um cara no meio daquele aço que ficava doido dizendo "Vai August mostra pra esses idiotar pinguços como que um Lancer pilota"

meu pai nunca deu bola e sempre ignorava o velho.


Era dificil conter o velho pra não falar merda, minha mãe sempre brigava comigo e meu pai

por ficar mexendo onde não devíamos, ficar reparando essas maquinas ilegais, ela dizia que isso iria atrair problema

e eu duvidava...até chegar o dia da Federação intergaláctica começar um recolhimento de peças de Lancer caídos sem numeração de serie

por sorte aqueles caras são lerdos e pesados e eles não esperava que eu mesmo tivesse construído meu propio "Planador Solar"

Fugi dos tiras pelos becos e vielas levando comigo alguns núcleos que iam dar uma folga pra eu mamãe e papai e o velho

logo depois da fuga acho que uns 2 dias depois ,estava eu meu pai junto com alguns lutadores dos ringues com os rostos estampados

em cartazes holográficos dizendo bem grande e CLARAMENTE DESCRITIVO.


"PROCURA-SE MECANICOS IRREGULARES ARCHIBALD E AUGUST VIVOS"

já os lutadores...não diria a mesma sorte, os homi não perdoaram e queriam o coro deles

Minha mãe e o Velho após se mudarmos pra parte baixa do planeta tiveram que buscar comida enquanto nos roubávamos peças e as vendíamos no mercado ilegal da "Lua Azul"

um mercado gigante e imenso, basicamente o que você vende aqui não vai ser achado no outro dia, há um lema nesse lugar

"Se ninguém me viu siguinifica que nunca existiu"

Garantia e uma lenda urbana e todo cuidado com o Clã "Red Fang" é pouco perdi 14 núcleos

por conta deles é demorei semanas pra reparar o Planador

Agora estamos aqui um fugitivo com sua familia vivendo em barracos embaixo da ponte e vendendo peças

junto com um velho doido que insiste que meu pai e um Lancer...sinceramente tá foda.

weapon.flavorDescription:
Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-II (T-2) line displays GMS’s proprietary “charged” melee weapons and energy weapons. T-2 charged melee weapons are structurally similar to GMS’s T-1 melee weapons, though built with different materials to tolerate the intense heat generated by their projected plasma sheaths. These sheaths can be toggled on or off, depending on the needs of the pilot. GMS’s T-2 energy weapons, like their T-1 kinetics, are sturdy tools with predictable power scaling, minimal particle scattering, and consistent performance ranges. They feature universal ports allowing them to accept a variety of power sources, from hardline cabling through to “magazine” style power packs.

Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-III (T-3) line is made up of heavy weapons, ordnance, and other exotic, specialized, or massive weapons. A broad classification, the T-3 range includes conventional-kinetic anti-materiel rifles, super-rapid cycling pulse rifles, missile racks, cannons, and drone nexuses – “hive”style launchers that serve as miniature factory, hangar, and deployment systems for portable drones. The classification also includes the fearsome “segment knife”, a system that uses flash-printing to produce disposable edged weapons in a vicinity around the user.

systems.flavorDescription: Composed of woven covers for critical joints and systems, reactive weave not only protects these sensitive components from fouling and poor weather, but provides a surface for the application of SSC’s unique loomware technology. Reactive weave is powered, making it capable of free-flexing to augment mobility and reduce the stress placed on a mech’s joints.

All proprietary IPS-N mech cores feature their QuickMod system – a modular, legacy-compatible system of joints, hardpoints, and internal slots that makes installing upgrades simple. This proved to be a necessary feature for Albatross maktebas long out of synch with Union Realtime.

weapon.flavorDescription: Shock knives are short, powered blades designed for integration with Shock Wreaths, a popular post-fab modification. The knives are custom-sculpted by SSC’s Terashima artisan enclave, each one bearing the unique hash-stamp of its designer. Part of SSC’s LUX-Iconic line – a civilian-accessible track of the BELLA CIAO line – each shock knife print code allows only a single use. If lost, pilots must submit an apology and request in writing explaining the circumstances of the loss in order to receive another code.

Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-III (T-3) line is made up of heavy weapons, ordnance, and other exotic, specialized, or massive weapons. A broad classification, the T-3 range includes conventional-kinetic anti-materiel rifles, super-rapid cycling pulse rifles, missile racks, cannons, and drone nexuses – “hive”style launchers that serve as miniature factory, hangar, and deployment systems for portable drones. The classification also includes the fearsome “segment knife”, a system that uses flash-printing to produce disposable edged weapons in a vicinity around the user.

Rail rifles are popular weapons for use in all theaters, but they are the only choice for pilots operating in atmospheres made up of highly combustible gases. They use a line of cascading electromagnets to accelerate small projectiles at tremendous speeds, firing without the need for combustion.
Like other rail weapons, rail rifles are quiet in comparison to their traditional counterparts, although massive power requirements make it difficult to mask their energy signatures.

A war pike is a simple weapon – a long haft, topped with a dense, slim point, meant to puncture armor. Early designs were derivative of mining pylons, but the modern war pike is a sturdy, balanced, and reliable weapon that’s perfect for a charge.

gear.flavorDescription: A powered third arm mounted on a bracket on the hardsuit. Tertiary arms are powered and controlled using the same neural bridge processes that allow hardsuits to respond to user input. They can be equipped with manipulators to allow for fine motor control, weapons to enhance combat efficacy, or specialty tools.
A miniaturized version of Union’s full-scale printers, handheld printers can be used to make simple objects out of flexible and durable plastic – as long as you have the right pattern chip.
“Patch” is pilot slang for any kind of modern first aid gear, including sprayable medi-gel and instant-acting medical patches.
